name: TunnelJumper
description:
Version 7a update: Fixed expert mode and introduced an easier set of platforms for players after feedback stating that the game was quite difficult. Also nerfed stars so the rising water will actually threaten you at some point.
Version 7b update: Fixed the 'how to play button' so it actually does something.

You control a character in the bottom of a seemingly endless vertical tunnel, and are trying to jump your way back out. The controls are very simple: All you have to do is drag the white circle in a direction and release when you feel it has enough speed to launch the character.

This is a game I originally intended to create for mobile, but after discovering webGL I thought it would make a better format to host the game so no one has to download anything.

the source code for this project can be found here if you are interested in the finer details of how I made it: https://github.com/Pizzaboy10/TunnelJumper.git
